subject: Ti.Ref.No. 459246724 - Supply Of Natural Gas To The Atm Ec (bulgaria-sofia: Natural Gas)
text:
[http://www.tendersinfo.com/mail/top_left.gif]   [http://www.tendersinfo.com/mail/top_right.gif]

  TendersInfo [http://www.tendersinfo.com/images/common/logo.gif]http://www.tendersinfo.com   Dear Sir\Madam,  






We are a Mumbai based B2B exchange which provides consultancy services in Global Business and Bidding Opportunities in all
Business Sectors. We have more than 2 Lakhs registered suppliers with us who look out for Sub-Contracting opportunities in their
area of business.

We request you to forward us any documents, clarifications, amendments, etc. issued as part of this contract process or required
information as mentioned below.


         

a)  Contract Value b)  List of Short Listed Bidders c)  Contact person d)  Mailing Address

         

We also request you to include our name in your mailing list for sending further information and advertisements for Expression of
Interest, NIT, RFPs etc.

         

This information may please be sent to ratna@market-focus.biz [ratna@market-focus.biz] . We look forward to a long and mutually
beneficial relationship with your esteemed organization.

         

 

Thanks and Regards,

         

Ratna Vartak - Manager (Content and Research) Market Focus, Address 201, Eden Rose Shopping Centre, Beverly Park, Kanakia Road,  
Opp. Cinemax Multiplex, Mira Road (East), Thane 401107, India Telephone No. +91-22-28555551   Extn: 804 Mobile No. +91-9930363804
Fax +91-22- 28127354 E-Mail ratna@market-focus.biz [ratna@market-focus.biz] , tainfogetway@gmail.com [tainfogetway@gmail.com]
